Improvements.Improvement: Replace repetitive calls to config setters with a method
Improvements.Description: Instead of calling each setter of `config` object separately, it is better to use a method that would take `newBean` as an argument and set all the properties of `config` in one place. This would make the code cleaner and easier to maintain.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract validation into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The validation process should be extracted into a separate method for better code readability and maintainability.
